mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE (MID, TITLE, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{mid},#{title},#{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ART_TYPE AS artType, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ARTICLE ORDER BY ARTSEQ DESC) A LIMIT 0, 5
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTICLE WHERE ARTSEQ LIKE #{artseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE ARTSEQ LIKE #{artseq}
